title: activities for the purposes of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967):
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Sporting Grounds
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Sporting Grounds 

Industry) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited industrial training (sporting ground industry) order 2022

title: activities for the purposes of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967):
heading: 2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial
text_raw:
2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial 
activities for the purposes of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967): 

(a) 

creating, preparing and maintaining outdoor grounds including 
parks, grassland, sporting facilities and artificial sports pitches 
for sporting and recreational purposes.
text_norm: 2 following activity hereby declared designated industrial activity purpose industrial training act 1967 (no 5 1967) (a) creating preparing maintaining outdoor ground including park grassland sporting facility artificial sport pitch sporting recreational purpose

title: activities for the purposes of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967):
heading: In this Order :
text_raw:
3. 

In this Order : 

"artificial sports pitches" means man-made outdoor sporting facilities; 

"grassland" means an area in which the vegetation is dominated by a nearly 
continuous cover of grasses; 

"sporting facility" means a specific area relating to or used for sport 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th August, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [405] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of An tSeirbhís 
Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna, 

 26 July 2022.

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf. 

ANDREW BROWNLEE 

SOLAS CEO 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf.

title: activities for the purposes of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967):
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna was established under the 
Further Education and Training Act 2013 to promote training in industry and 
commerce. 

This Order defines the activities of the sporting grounds industry in relation to 
which An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna shall exercise its 
functions in the creation of statutory apprenticeships.
